nodes.text: The wasaka berry was a fruit that could be found on the planet Kashyyyk. One day, the young Wookiee Lumpawaroo, son of Chewbacca, sneaked away to find wasaka berries in the dangerous lower forest of Kashyyyk.

In 14 BBY, Greez Dritus kept wasaka berry candles in the Stinger Mantis. When the Nightsister Merrin asked if Dritus had gundark's blood candles, Dritus told her that he had wasaka berry candles and suggested using them after going to the refresher.
